tool_description: Introducing our cutting-edge text to speech service, designed to provide you with the most realistic human-sounding voices at an affordable price. Our service is fast and reliable, delivering high-quality audio output in a matter of seconds. Additionally, we offer a wide range of languages and a variety of voice choices, so you can find the perfect fit for your project. Whether you need a voiceover for a video, an audiobook, or any other project, our text to speech service has you covered. Ex...
title: TTSKraken

api_list.name: List Speakers
api_list.description: List the speakers available and some more information such as the languages they can speak.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ttskraken.p.rapidapi.com/models/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ttskraken.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: List Languages
api_list.description: Get a list of currently supported languages. We are constantly adding more every few weeks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ttskraken.p.rapidapi.com/languages/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ttskraken.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Run TTS
api_list.description: Run the actual  Text-to-speech and get a wav file back. You can then download or save the file to your drive.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ttskraken.p.rapidapi.com/tts/run"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ttskraken.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

import requests
